-oB.help: Output binary. This parameter must be followed by the output filename (default: a.out) .

-oI.help: Output immediate code. This parameter must be followed by the output filename.

--version.help: Prints the program version and quits.

-Wshort-jump-out-of-range.help: Disables short jump out of range compile warning.

-Woptimizable-long-jump.help: Disables long jump used on label in current segment compile warning.

-I.help: Set the include path (directories separated by ';').

-lc.help: Provide a linker configuration script as a command line parameter.
